name: Dapper Dungeons
description: The Dapper Dungeons is a 2D Platforming Game Made entirely by me Jonah Diaz. Created using Unity Engine and C# Scripting. As of time of upload we have a basic Main Menu, Main Program and Game Over Scene. The Player Character can move jump and Duck and there is also 3 coins as well as a Mace Enemy that will follow the player using am A* Mapping system. Please Check Dev Lop for any updates made from this point forward.
